TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Slider extends System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase

summary.span: 表示一个控件，该控件可让用户通过沿 移动 控件从一个值范围中进行选择。

span.span: Represents a control that lets the user select from a range of values by moving a control along a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件允许用户从一系列值中选择值。A control lets users select a value from a range of values. 下图显示了 控件的示例。The following illustration shows an example of a control. **滑块控件的示例****Example of a Slider Control** ![滑块插图](~/add/media/genericslider.png "滑块图")![Slider illustration](~/add/media/genericslider.png "Slider illustration") 可以通过设置 控件的属性来对其进行自定义。You can customize a control by setting its properties. 以下列表描述了可自定义的 的一些属性：The following list describes some of the attributes of a that you can customize: - 的方向（水平或垂直）。The orientation of the , either horizontal or vertical. - 沿 轨迹的刻度线位置。The tick mark locations along the track. - 显示 "工具提示" 以显示 的当前值。The display of tooltips to show the current value of the . - 对齐刻度线或沿 的任意点定位的功能。The ability of the to either snap to tick marks or to be positioned at any point along the . - 沿 增加值的方向。The direction of increasing value along the . 有关如何自定义 控件的详细信息，请参阅单个成员。For more information about how to customize a control, see the individual member. 重写 属性的元数据，并将其默认值设置为10。 overrides the metadata of the property and sets its default to 10. 有关详细信息，请参阅[依赖项属性概述](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-properties-overview)。For more information, see [Dependency Properties Overview](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-properties-overview). > [!NOTE] > 如果 的值已进行动画处理，则在动画完成后，用户可能无法再与 控件交互。If the value of the is animated, the user may no longer be able to interact with the control after the animation finishes. 请参阅[如何：使用情节提要对属性进行动画处理后设置该属性](/dotnet/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-set-a-property-after-animating-it-with-a-storyboard)，以获取有关如何在对 进行动画处理后还原其用户控件的选项。See [How to: Set a Property After Animating It with a Storyboard](/dotnet/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-set-a-property-after-animating-it-with-a-storyboard) for options of how you can restore user control of a after it is animated. ## 自定义滑块控件Customizing the Slider Control 若要对多个 控件应用相同的属性设置，请使用 属性。To apply the same property settings to multiple controls, use the property. 您可以修改默认 以使控件具有独特的外观。You can modify the default to give the control a unique appearance. 有关创建 的详细信息，请参阅[通过创建 System.windows.controls.controltemplate> 自定义现有控件的外观](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control)。For more information about creating a , see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control). 若要查看特定于 的部分和状态，请参阅[滑块样式和模板](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/slider-styles-and-templates)。To see the parts and states that are specific to the , see [Slider Styles and Templates](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/slider-styles-and-templates). 此控件的依赖属性可能由控件的默认样式设置。Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control's default style. 如果按默认样式设置属性，则当控件出现在应用程序中时，属性可能会更改为默认值。If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application. 默认样式取决于应用程序运行时使用的桌面主题。The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running. 有关详细信息，请参阅[默认的 WPF 主题](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252). [!INCLUDE[setting-a-visual-property](~/includes/visual-property-note.md)] ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将 的 属性绑定到 控件的 。The following examples shows how to bind the property of a to the of a control. 下面的示例定义了一个名为 `RectangleHeight` 的 控件，该控件的 介于0到200之间。The following example defines a control that is named `RectangleHeight` that can have a between 0 and 200. [!code-xaml[SliderwithDataBinding#Minimum](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/SliderwithDataBinding/CS/Pane1.xaml#minimum)] 下面的示例演示如何定义将其 属性绑定到 控件 的 。The following example shows how to define a that binds its property to the of the control. （在完整示例中，为 属性创建了类似的绑定。）(In the complete sample, a similar binding is created for the property.) [!code-xaml[SliderwithDataBinding#BindingRectangle](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/SliderwithDataBinding/CS/Pane1.xaml#bindingrectangle)]

summary.span: 获取或设置在按下 时是否显示包含 的当前值的工具提示。

span.span: Gets or sets whether a tooltip that contains the current value of the displays when the is pressed.

summary.span: 如果显示工具提示，此属性还指定工具提示的位置。

span.span: If a tooltip is displayed, this property also specifies the placement of the tooltip.

value.span: 值之一，该值确定用于显示与 的 相关的工具提示的位置，或指定不显示工具提示。

span.span: One of the values that determines where to display the tooltip with respect to the of the , or that specifies to not show a tooltip.

value.span: 默认值为 ，该值指定不显示工具提示。

span.span: The default is , which specifies that a tooltip is not displayed.

summary.span: 获取或设置在工具提示中的 的 的小数点右侧显示的小数位数。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of digits that are displayed to the right side of the decimal point for the of the in a tooltip.

value.span: 工具提示中显示的 的精度，由小数点右侧显示的小数位数指定。

span.span: The precision of the that displays in the tooltip, specified as the number of digits that appear to the right of the decimal point.

value.span: 默认值为零 (0)。

span.span: The default is zero (0).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的值必须为非负整数。The value of this property must be a non-negative integer. 如果将此属性设置为非负整数以外的值，则会出现异常。If this property is set to a value other than a non-negative integer, an exception occurs. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置 属性。The following example shows how to set the property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 的样式中包括 时，将使用此属性。This property is used when a is included in the style for a . 的默认样式包括两个不可见的 控件，这些控件使用 和 的每一端之间的空间。The default style for the includes two invisible controls that use the space between the and each end of the . 按下一个不可见的按钮时， 会在应用 属性后，通过在该方向上移动 来做出响应。When you press one of the invisible buttons, the responds by moving the in that direction after the property is applied. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

summary.span: 获取或设置增加值的方向。

span.span: Gets or sets the direction of increasing value.

value.span: 如果增加值的方向向左（对于水平滑块）或向下（对于垂直滑块），则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the direction of increasing value is to the left for a horizontal slider or down for a vertical slider; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的值确定 的增加值的方向。The value of this property determines the direction of increasing value of a . 例如，当 属性设置为 `false`时，当您将 上的控件向上移动时 ， 将增加。For example, when you move the control up on a vertical when the property is set to `false`, the of the increases. 如果 属性的值更改为 `true`，则 的 会随着 上移而减少。If the value of the property is changed to `true`, the of the decreases as the moves up. 此属性绑定到它实现的 控件的 属性。This property binds to the property for the control that it implements. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置 属性。The following example shows how to set the property. [!code-csharp[Slider#SelectionRange](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/Slider/CSharp/Pane1.xaml.cs#selectionrange)] [!code-vb[Slider#SelectionRange](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/Slider/VisualBasic/Pane1.xaml.vb#selectionrange)] [!code-xaml[Slider#SelectionRange](~/samples/snippets/xaml/VS_Snippets_Wpf/Slider/xaml/window1.xaml#selectionrange)]

member this.IsMoveToPointEnabled : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否立即将 的 移动到在鼠标指针悬停在 轨道的上方时鼠标单击的位置。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the of a moves immediately to the location of the mouse click that occurs while the mouse pointer pauses on the track.

value.span: 如果 立即移动到鼠标单击的位置，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the moves immediately to the location of a mouse click; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将此属性设置为 "`false`"，并在 远离 时发生鼠标单击，则 会按鼠标单击方向移动。When this property is set to `false` and a mouse click occurs along the away from the , the moves in the direction of the mouse click. 移动每次鼠标单击 属性定义的距离，而不是立即移动到鼠标单击位置。Instead of moving immediately to the mouse click location, the moves a distance that is defined by the property for each mouse click. 通过按住鼠标左键来模拟多个鼠标单击的效果，直到将 重定位到所需的位置。The effect of multiple mouse clicks can be emulated by pressing and holding the left mouse button until the is repositioned to the desired location. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置 属性。The following example shows how to set the property. [!code-csharp[Slider#SelectionRange](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/Slider/CSharp/Pane1.xaml.cs#selectionrange)] [!code-vb[Slider#SelectionRange](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/Slider/VisualBasic/Pane1.xaml.vb#selectionrange)] [!code-xaml[Slider#SelectionRange](~/samples/snippets/xaml/VS_Snippets_Wpf/Slider/xaml/window1.xaml#selectionrange)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks "" 和 "" 属性定义选择范围，并且必须设置为 "选择范围"，才能在 设置为 "`true`" 时显示。The and properties define a selection range and must be set for the selection range to appear when is set to `true`. 下图显示定义了选择范围的 。The following illustration shows a with a selection range defined. **为滑块控件定义的选择范围****A selection range defined for a Slider control** ![滑块选择范围](~/add/media/sliderselectionrange.GIF "滑块选择范围")![Slider selection range](~/add/media/sliderselectionrange.GIF "Slider selection range") 此属性绑定到它实现的 控件的 属性。This property is bound to the property of the control that it implements. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置 属性。The following example shows how to set the property. span.span: The event data.

summary.span: 提供用于 路由事件的类处理。

span.span: Provides class handling for the routed event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 `true` 属性时，此实现将 移动到鼠标单击的位置。When the property is `true`, this implementation moves the to the location of the mouse click. 此实现通过将事件数据的 属性设置为 `true`，将 事件标记为已处理。This implementation marks the event as handled by setting the property of the event data to `true`. 此方法处理事件，以便 的 控件不处理事件。The event is handled by this method so that the controls of the do not handle the event.

para.span: 如果重写 ，请始终在 实现中调用基实现。

span.span: If you override , always call the base implementation in your implementation.

para.span: 未能调用基实现会阻止基类使用类处理程序来处理事件，这可能会更改最终类的运行时行为。

span.span: Failure to call the base implementation prevents base classes from handling the event with a class handler, which might change the run-time behavior of the final class.

para.span: 你可以在特殊处理之前或之后调用基本实现，具体取决于你的要求。

span.span: You can call the base implementation either before or after your special handling, depending on your requirements.
